alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 7:26AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cook County through 800 AM CDT... At 726 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tofte, or 26 miles southwest of Grand Marais, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lutsen around 740 AM CDT. Grand Marais and Eagle Mountain around 755 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Temperance River State Park, Caribou Lake, Two Island Lake, Devil Track Lake and Cascade River State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore
